definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式爲憑單據以不可撤消的信用證向髮卡行議付。

sentences.english: Abuse by a buyer of the reversal process provided by the buyer's issuing bank;
sentences.chinese: 買方髮卡行做出撤銷處理導致買方投訴。

sentences.english: Five working days are needed to complete all the procedures.
sentences.chinese: 所有流程至髮卡時間共需五個工作日。

sentences.english: The issuing bank gets repaid when the customer pays his credit card bill.
sentences.chinese: 當用戶支付信用卡賬單時，髮卡銀行的處理會很快。

sentences.english: You could contact the issuing bank for information.
sentences.chinese: 您可以接洽信用卡的髮卡銀行扣問情況。

sentences.english: It looks very nice when she wears the half-moon hairpin in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 這個半月形的髮卡戴在她的頭髮上真好看。

sentences.english: In lower thoracic and lumbar regions posterior medullary arteries present typical "hair - pin" curve.
sentences.chinese: 胸下部及腰部後髓動脈呈典型“髮卡”樣折曲。

sentences.english: That task is now performed by the banks which assume the credit risk.
sentences.chinese: 現在這個認定信貸風險的任務由髮卡銀行承擔。

sentences.english: I don't know, you have to contact with your issuing bank or you can pay by cash.
sentences.chinese: 不知道，您可以聯繫髮卡行或者用現金支付。

sentences.english: You want to make a hair barrette with Bluetooth?
sentences.chinese: 你想做一個裝有藍牙的髮卡？

sentences.english: In this case, the lenders offer credit card emergency assistance .
sentences.chinese: 遇到這種情況，髮卡行會提供信用卡緊急援助。

sentences.english: “It should be more of a concern among card issuers than it is,” he said.
sentences.chinese: 髮卡行應該多關注這個問題。

sentences.english: The road immediately climbed steeply in a series of hairpin turns.
sentences.chinese: 在一連串的髮卡型彎道上，路一下子變得非常陡峭。

definition: to issue a card/(slang) to reject a guy or a girl/to chuck
alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
